title.no: Suzuki Omnichord OM-84 med og uten effekter
title.en: Suzuki Omnichord OM-84 with and without effects

content.no:
- Første klipp: Direktelyd uten effekter
- Andre klipp: Hver del er spilt inn separat og sendt gjennom effektbokser.
Instrument: Suzuki Omnichord System Two OM-84.
Effekter: Roland SH-09 filter, Pro Co RAT 2, Roland Dimension D SDD-320, Electro-Harmonix Deluxe Memory Man, Fulltone Tube Tape Echo, VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr. og Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978.
content.en:
- First clip: Direct signal without effects.
- Second clip: Each part is recorded separately and sent through effects units.
Instrument: Suzuki Omnichord System Two OM-84.
Effects: Roland SH-09 filter, Pro Co RAT 2, Roland Dimension D SDD-320, Electro-Harmonix Deluxe Memory Man, Fulltone Tube Tape Echo, VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr. and Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978.

title.no: Spilledåse på Korg microSAMPLER med båndekko og klang
title.en: Music box on the Korg microSAMPLER with tape echo and reverb

content.no:
Kjapp demo av en spilledåse som blir samplet med en Korg microSAMPLER.
Instrument: Korg microSAMPLER.
Effekter: Fulltone Tube Tape Echo og Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978.
content.en:
Quick demo of a music box sampled with the Korg microSAMPLER.
Instrument: Korg microSAMPLER.
Effects: Fulltone Tube Tape Echo and Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978.

thumbnailDescription: A Korg microSAMPLER keyboard, Fulltone Tube Tape Echo and a Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978 reverb

title.no: Synth solo med Sequential Circuits Pro-One
title.en: Synth solo with Sequential Circuits Pro-One

content.no:
Synth solo med Sequential Circuits Pro-One synthesizer over en 5/4 låtidé.
Instrument: Sequential Circuits Pro-One.
Effekter: Fulltone Tube Tape Echo.
Båndopptaker: Fostex X-28H.
content.en:
Synth solo with Sequential Circuits Pro-One synthesizer over a 5/4 groove.
Instrument: Sequential Circuits Pro-One.
Effects: Fulltone Tube Tape Echo.
Tape recorder: Fostex X-28H.

thumbnailDescription: A Sequential Circuits Pro-One synthesizer being played
